text: The article is devoted to the modern state of the problem of blood pressure variability (BPV). Along with discussion of classification and methods of diagnosis it contains data on prognostic value of visit-to-visit BPV. We have also reviewed effect on BPV of various regimens of antihypertensive therapy and presented evidence base supporting ability of amlodipine/perindopril fixed dose combination to lower visit-to-visit BPV.
title: [Blood Pressure Variability. Visit-to-Visit Blood Pressure Variability].
